string.name: eula_accept
string.translation_description: In the 'Terms of Service' dialog, the button to accept.

string.name: eula_body
string.translation_description: The body in the 'Terms of Service. See http://m.google.com/toscountry. %1$s: host name, 'm.google.com'

resources.string: Utilizzando i prodotti e i servizi Google per cellulari (\"Servizi\"), l\'utente accetta a) i Termini e condizioni d\'uso di YouTube (%1$s/tos_youtube) per i Servizi correlati a YouTube, b) i Termini e condizioni di Google Maps (%1$s/tos_maps) per i Servizi di mappatura, i Servizi locali e i Servizi associati alla posizione geografica, c) i Termini di servizio di Google Libri (%1$s/tos_books) per i Servizi correlati a Google Libri e d) i Termini di servizio di Google (%1$s/utos) per tutti gli altri Servizi, aggiornati di volta in volta.

string.name: eula_copyright_year
string.translation_description: The copyright year in the 'Terms of Service'. See http://m.google.com/toscountry. \u00A9 is the unicode value for the copyright symbol.

string.name: eula_date
string.translation_description: The date in the 'Terms of Service'. See http://m.google.com/toscountry.

string.name: eula_decline
string.translation_description: In the 'Terms of Service' dialog, the button to decline.

string.name: eula_footer
string.translation_description: The footer in the 'Terms of Service'. See http://m.google.com/toscountry. %1$s: host name, 'm.google.com'

resources.string: Qualsiasi attribuzione o comunicazione relativa a tali contenuti è disponibile alla pagina %1$s/legalnotices.

string.name: eula_title
string.translation_description: The title for the 'Terms of Service' dialog.

string.name: export_all_option
string.translation_description: When exporting all tracks to the external storage, the option to export as a certain file format. %1$s: the file format. E.g., 'KML'. %2$s: the directory. E.g., '/MyTracks/kml'.

string.name: export_all_title
string.translation_description: The dialog title to export all tracks to the external storage.

string.name: export_external_storage
string.translation_description: When exporting a track, the option to export to the external storage.

string.name: export_external_storage_error
string.translation_description: When exporting tracks to the external storage, the error message indicating that only some of the tracks are exported. %1$d the number of tracks successfully exported. E.g., '1'. %1$s the number of tracks to export. E.g., '2 tracks'. %2$s the directory. E.g., '/MyTracks/kml'.

string.name: export_external_storage_no_track
string.translation_description: When exporting tracks to the external storage, the message in the result dialog when there is no tracks to export.

string.name: export_external_storage_no_track_title
string.translation_description: When exporting tracks to the external storage, the title in the result dialog when there is no tracks to export.

string.name: export_external_storage_option
string.translation_description: When exporting a track to the external storage, the option to export as a certain file format. %1$s: the file format. E.g., 'KML'. %2$s: the directory. E.g., '/MyTracks/kml'.

string.name: export_external_storage_progress_message
string.translation_description: When exporting tracks to the external storage, the progress message. %1$s: the directory. E.g., '/MyTracks/kml'.

string.name: export_external_storage_success
string.translation_description: When exporting tracks to the external storage, the success message. %1$s the number of tracks. E.g., '2 tracks'. %2$s the directory. E.g., '/MyTracks/kml'.

string.name: export_google_drive
string.translation_description: When exporting a track, the option to export to Google Drive.

string.name: export_google_error
string.translation_description: When exporting a track, the error message. %1$s: service name. E.g, Google Maps. %2$s: service url. E.g, maps.google.com.

resources.string: Si è verificato un errore. Impossibile esportare in %1$s (%2$s). Riprova.

string.translation_description: When exporting a track, the option to export to Google Fusion Tables.

string.translation_description: When exporting a track to Google Fusion Tables, the option to export as a new public table as opposed to a new private table.

string.translation_description: When exporting a track, the option to export to Google Maps.

string.translation_description: When exporting a track to Google Maps, the option to export as a new public map as opposed to a new unlisted map.

resources.string: come nuova mappa non in elenco

string.translation_description: When exporting a track, the option to export to Google Spreadsheets.

string.name: export_google_success
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google, the additional comment on the bottom of the result page. %1$s: service name. E.g, Google Maps. %2$s: service url. E.g, maps.google.com.

resources.string: Percorso esportato in %1$s (%2$s). Potrebbero essere necessari alcuni minuti prima che sia visualizzato.

string.name: export_title
string.translation_description: The dialog title when exporting a track.

string.name: external_storage_not_available
string.translation_description: Error message when the external storage is not available.

resources.string: Dispositivo di memorizzazione esterno non disponibile.

string.name: external_storage_not_writable
string.translation_description: Error message when the external storage is not writable.

resources.string: Dispositivo di memorizzazione esterno non scrivibile.

string.name: files_few
string.translation_description: The phrase for 'few' files. This is used when the language requires special treatment of 'small' numbers. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals %1$d an integer number. The number is a small number.

string.name: files_many
string.translation_description: The phrase for 'many' files. This is used when the language requires special treatment of 'large' numbers. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals %1$d an integer number. The number is a large number.

string.name: files_one
string.translation_description: The phrase for 1 file. This is used when the language requires special treatment of numbers like one. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals

string.name: files_other
string.translation_description: The phrase for 'other' files. This is used when the language does not require special treatment of the given quantity (as with all numbers in Chinese). See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals %1$d an integer number.

string.name: files_two
string.translation_description: The phrase for 2 files. This is used when the language requires special treatment of numbers like two. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals

string.name: files_zero
string.translation_description: The phrase for 0 files. This is used when the language requires special treatment of the number 0. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals

string.name: import_error
string.translation_description: When importing from the external storage, the error message indicating that only some of the files are imported. %1$d the number of files successfully imported. E.g., '2'. %2$s the number of files in the directory. E.g., '2 files'. %3$s the directory. E.g., '/MyTracks/kml'.

string.translation_description: When importing from the external storage, the error message when the directory doesn't exist. %1$s: the directory. E.g., '/MyTracks/kml'.

string.name: settings_sensor_ant_reset_speed_distance_monitor
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor' settings, under the 'ANT+' section, the option to reset an ANT+ stride based speed distance monitor, also known as foot pod. Note that ANT+ is a radio standard. Character limit: ~26 (1 line)

string.name: settings_sensor_bluetooth
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor' settings, the section to configure the Bluetooth settings. Character limit: ~26 (1 line)

string.name: settings_sensor_bluetooth_pairing
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor' settings, under the 'Bluetooth' section, the option to pair with a Bluetooth sensor. Character limit: ~26 (1 line)

string.name: settings_sensor_bluetooth_pairing_summary
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor' settings, under the 'Bluetooth' section, the summary for the 'Bluetooth pairing' option explaining that it will open the Android's Bluetooth settings to pair a sensor.

resources.string: Apri le impostazioni Bluetooth di Android per accoppiare un sensore

string.name: settings_sensor_bluetooth_sensor
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor' settings, under the 'Bluetooth' section, the picker to choose a Bluetooth sensor. Character limit: ~23 (1 line)

string.name: settings_sensor_connected
string.translation_description: A message when a sensor is connected. %1$s: sensor name. E.g., 'Polar Bluetooth'.

string.name: settings_sensor_type
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor' settings, the picker to choose a sensor type. Character limit: ~23 (1 line)

string.name: settings_sensor_type_ant
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor' settings, the option in the 'Sensor type' picker to choose an ANT+ sensor. Note that ANT+ is a radio standard. Character limit: ~20 (1 line)

string.name: settings_sensor_type_polar
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor' settings, the option in the 'Sensor type' picker to choose a Polar bluetooth sensor. Do not translate Polar, the company name, but can translate Bluetooth, the radio standard. Character limit: ~20 (1 line)

string.name: settings_sensor_type_zephyr
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor' settings, the option in the 'Sensor type' picker to choose a Zephyr bluetooth sensor. Do not translate Zephyr, the company name, but can translate Bluetooth, the radio standard. Character limit: ~20 (1 line)

string.name: settings_sharing
string.translation_description: In the 'Settings' page, the option to change the track sharing related settings. Character limit: ~26 (1 line)

string.name: settings_sharing_allow_access
string.translation_description: In the 'Sharing' settings, the checkbox option to allow third party apps access to the My Tracks data. Character limit: ~23 (1 line)

string.name: settings_sharing_allow_access_confirm_message
string.translation_description: In the 'Sharing' settings, after checking the 'Allow access' checkbox, the confirmation dialog message informing the user that other apps, including apps installed in the future, will be able to control and access My Tracks data. In addition, no further notification of third party app access will be shown.

resources.string: Altre applicazioni, incluse le applicazioni future, saranno in grado di controllare e accedere ai dati My Tracks. Non ci saranno ulteriori notifiche.

string.name: settings_sharing_allow_access_summary_off
string.translation_description: In the 'Sharing' settings, the summary for the 'Allow access' checkbox option when it is unchecked explaining that other apps cannot read, write, start/stop recording My Tracks data.

resources.string: Altre applicazioni non riescono a leggere, scrivere, avviare/fermare la registrazione dei dati My Tracks.

string.name: settings_sharing_allow_access_summary_on
string.translation_description: In the 'Sharing' settings, the summary for the 'Allow access' checkbox option when it is checked explaining that other apps can read, write, start/stop recording My Tracks data.

resources.string: Altre applicazioni riescono a leggere, scrivere, avviare/fermare la registrazione dei dati My Tracks.

string.name: settings_stats_coordinate
string.translation_description: In the 'Stats settings, the option to show latitude and longitude. Character limit: ~23 (1 line)

string.name: settings_stats_grade_elevation
string.translation_description: In the 'Stats settings, the option to show grade and elevation. Grade is the amount of inclination to the horizontal, also known as slope or incline. Character limit: ~23 (1 line)

string.name: settings_stats_rate_title
string.translation_description: In the 'Stats' settings, the option to change the preferred rate, either speed (mi/hr) or pace (min/mi). Character limit: ~23 (1 line)

string.translation_description: In the 'Stats' settings, the option to use imperial units, with examples.

string.name: settings_stats_units_metric
string.translation_description: In the 'Stats' settings, the option to use metric units, with examples.

string.name: settings_stats_units_title
string.translation_description: In the 'Stats' settings page, the option to change the preferred units, either metric (km) or imperial (mi). Character limit: ~23 (1 line)

string.name: share_track_emails_hint
string.translation_description: The hint for the auto complete text box for entering email addresses.

Credo che ti potrebbe interessare questo percorso.

Per visualizzare questo percorso, usa Google Earth o un altro software di mappatura.

%1$s

string.name: share_track_share_url
string.translation_description: After sending a track to Google, the button on the result dialog to share the uploaded track URL with friends.

string.translation_description: When sharing a track URL with friends, the body of the message. Note that \n is the newline character. %1$s: url. E.g., 'https://maps.google.com/maps'. %2$s: track description.

resources.string:
Credo che potresti essere interessato a questo percorso:

%1$s

%2$s

string.name: sync_drive_confirm_message
string.translation_description: The dialog message to confirm sync to Google Drive. %1$s account name. E.g., 'foo@foo.com'. %2$s folder name. E.g., 'My Tracks'.

resources.string: Tutti i file nella cartella \"%2$s\" di Google Drive di %1$s saranno importati come nuovi percorsi. Se non desiderati, sposta i file in una cartella diversa in anticipo.

string.name: sync_drive_enable_message
string.translation_description: The dialog message to enable sync to Google Drive.

resources.string: Questo ti permetterà di visualizzare i tuoi percorsi su Google Drive e visualizzare percorsi condivisi con te. Tutti i percorsi sincronizzati con Google Drive saranno privati per impostazione predefinita.

string.name: sync_drive_title
string.translation_description: The dialog title to sync to Google Drive.

string.name: track_name_format
string.translation_description: When creating a new track, the string format to name the track. %1$d: track number. E.g., '1'.

string.translation_description: When recording a track, the message on the My Tracks notification informing the user that My Tracks is actively recording his track.

string.name: track_delete_all_confirm_message
string.translation_description: When deleting all the tracks, the confirmation message.

resources.string: Tutti i percorsi e gli indicatori verranno definitivamente eliminati dal dispositivo. La sincronizzazione con Google Drive verrà disattivata. Nessun percorso verrà eliminato su Google Drive e sulla memoria esterna.

string.name: track_delete_one_confirm_message
string.translation_description: When deleting one track, the confirmation message.

resources.string: Questo percorso e i suoi marcatori verranno eliminati definitivamente dal dispositivo. Se la sincronizzazione con Google Drive è attivata, questa operazione eliminerà anche il percorso su Google Drive.

string.name: track_delete_multiple_confirm_message
string.translation_description: When deleting multiple tracks, the confirmation message.

resources.string: I percorsi selezionati e i loro marcatori verranno eliminati definitivamente dal dispositivo. Se la sincronizzazione con Google Drive è attivata, questa operazione eliminerà anche il percorso su Google Drive.

string.name: track_delete_progress_message
string.translation_description: The progress message when deleting tracks.

string.translation_description: In the track detail page, the title of the tab showing the chart.

resources.string: Per riprodurre il percorso devi disporre di Google Earth.

string.name: track_detail_install_earth_title

string.translation_description: Message informing the user not able to install Google Earth from the Play Store.

resources.string: Il percorso riprodotto in Google Earth verrà salvato in una memoria esterna.

string.name: tracks_few
string.translation_description: The phrase for 'few' tracks. This is used when the language requires special treatment of 'small' numbers. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals %1$d an integer number. The number is a small number.

string.name: tracks_many
string.translation_description: The phrase for 'many' tracks. This is used when the language requires special treatment of 'large' numbers. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals %1$d an integer number. The number is a large number.

string.name: tracks_one
string.translation_description: The phrase for 1 track. This is used when the language requires special treatment of numbers like one. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals

string.name: tracks_other
string.translation_description: The phrase for 'other' tracks. This is used when the language does not require special treatment of the given quantity (as with all numbers in Chinese). See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals %1$d an integer number.

string.name: tracks_two
string.translation_description: The phrase for 2 tracks. This is used when the language requires special treatment of numbers like two. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals

string.name: tracks_zero
string.translation_description: The phrase for 0 tracks. This is used when the language requires special treatment of the number 0. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals

string.name: voice_total_distance_zero
string.translation_description: For the voice announcement, the announcement when the current track's total distance is zero.

resources.string: Distanza totale My Tracks uguale a zero.
